Title: Fslogix. Add a command line to release the profile.
EnhancedContent:
Hello. Add a command line with arguments to be able to release frozen folders in FSlogix. If you don't want to fix the problem, let me automate it myself.

In large RDS installations, constant freezes and further duplication of local\_%username% folders cause problems.
Author: vara93
Description:
Hello. Add a command line with arguments to be able to release frozen folders in FSlogix. If you don't want to fix the problem, let me automate it myself.
